ingredients.Vegan Borsch: beetroot, porcini mushrooms, white cabbage, dried beans

Recipe.Vegan Borsch: Ingredients: , , , , Scale, , 1x, 2x, 3x, , , , , , 1/2, C dried porcini, , 1/2, C dried beans, , 350g, white cabbage, shredded roughly, , 1, potato (about, 200g, ), diced, , 1, small carrot, julienned, , 1, medium beetroot, julienned, , 1, medium onion, diced, , 1, small red chili, minced, , 3, garlic cloves, minced, , 1, heaped tbsp tomato paste, , 1 tbsp, white wine vinegar, , 1 tsp, brown sugar, , few pinches each of dried oregano, marjoram and basil, , 2, bay leaves, , oil for cooking, , salt and black pepper to taste, , vegan sour cream, and fresh parsley for garnishing, , , , , , , , , , , , Cook Mode, , Prevent your screen from going dark, , , , , ,  Instructions: , , , Soak beans overnight., , Put dried porcini in a big pot and cover with 2 liters of water. Set aside for 1-2 hours., , Drain the beans, add to mushrooms and bring to boil., , Meanwhile heat oil in a pan over medium heat. First throw in beetroot. Sprinkle with sugar, half of the vinegar and sauté for few minutes. Then add carrot, minced chili and onion. Stir until veggies start to brown. Lastly add tomato paste and about 1/2 cup of stock. Let it simmer for 5-10 minutes., , When beans are half cooked add shredded cabbage. Wait until the soup starts to boil again, season with salt and throw in potatoes. In a few minutes transfer sautéed veggies into the pot, add herbs and let it simmer uncovered until the beans and potatoes are cooked., , Taste for doneness and seasoning. Vegetables should be cooked but a bit crunchy. Add more salt and vinegar if needed. Finish with minced garlic, switch off the heat, cover with lid and let it sit for at least 30 minutes. Best on a second day., , Serve with vegan sour cream and fresh chopped parsley., , , , , , , Notes, , , Makes 4 big servings. Can be considered as a main course., , , , , Nutrition, , , Calories:, , 202, , Sugar:, , 9.4g, , Sodium:, , 55mg, , Fat:, , 3.9g, , Saturated Fat:, , 0.5g, , Carbohydrates:, , 35.1g, , Fiber:, , 9.5g, , Protein:, , 8.2g, , , , , Did you make this recipe?, , Share a photo and tag us — we can't wait to see what you've made!, , , , You may also like:, Ukrainian “Vinaigrette” salad, Vegan Root Vegetable Chowder with Roasted Sunchokes and Cabbage, Roasted Turnip and White Bean Soup, Black Bean and Vegetable Stew, Creamed Buckwheat with Roasted Beetroot and Sunchoke Purée, Purple cabbage soup, , , Filed Under:, Soups, , Tagged With:, beans, , , beetroot, , , cabbage, , , gluten-free, , , root vegetables, , , soup, , , Ukrainian, Subscribe, , Don't miss new recipe!, , , , , , Privacy Policy, , Previous Post:, « Roasted beetroot with garlic cashew cheese, Next Post:, Vegan gingerbread men », Reader Interactions, , , Leave a Reply, Cancel reply, Your email address will not be published., , Required fields are marked, *, , , Recipe rating, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , 5 Stars, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , 4 Stars, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , 3 Stars, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , 2 Stars, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , 1 Star, , , , , Comment, *, , Name, *, , , Email, *, , , Website, , , Notify me of followup comments via e-mail.
